Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne eshinyasio shianje nisho eshinyasio eshilulu muno
Ne baboolele amakhuwa kabacheni ba Ibrahim
Olwa benjila ewuwe nibaboola mbu; “mulembe” naboola mbu : “toto efwe khubakorerwe.”
Nibaboola mbu; Olaria tawe efwe khukhusubisia Omusiani wa machesi amanji”
Naboola; “Oh! Mumboolelanga kano, nemalile okhukofula, kho ni munjila shina yamumboolelangamwo kano?”
Nibaboola mbu; “Toto efwe khukhuboolela khubwatoto kho sholaba mubalia abafwitsanga omwoyo tawe.”
Naboola mbu; “Ne niwina ufwitsanga omwoyo okhurulana nende tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwe halali balia abakora?”
Naboola; “Mana shiamumbolela shindi nishina enywe Abarumwa
Nibaboola mbu; “Efwe khurumilwe khubandu abamabii”
Halali balia abaloonda Luti. Toto efwe khwitsa okhuhabina abo boosi
Halali omukhasi wuwe khumalile okhulola mbu alaba mubandu balitong’a inyuma
Mana Abarumwa olwa boola khubandu ba Luti
(Luti) naboola; “Toto enywe muli Abandu balamanyishe tawe.”
Nibaboola mbu; “mana efwe khukhureerere kalia kabakholelanga obukanakani” nomulembe
“Ne khukhwitsile khubulaamba, netoto efwe khuboolanga obwatoto.”
“Kho rula nende Abandu bawo, ebise bilala mubise bieshilo, nawe abalondekhwo, neyesiyesi mwinywe alakalukhanakhwo okhuhenga inyuma tawe, nemutsie wamulomesibungwa
Nenikhumubusilia likhuwa elo, mbu emisi chiabu chitsa okhutetwa mumabwibwi
Ne Abandu belitokho elo nibetsa nibasangalile
(Lut) Naboola mbu; “Toto bano ni abacheni banje khomulafimbia omurwe tawe”
“Ne murie Nyasaye, ne mulafimbia omurwe tawe”
Nibaboola mbu: “efwe shikhwakhukaniakho (okhurera) Abandu (belwanyi)
Naboola mbu: “ bano nabakhana banje itse ebahelesie(mubateshie) toto enywe nimuli abakholanga
Nditsuba khulubaka lulwo, mbu : “abo bali mubumesi bwabu nibanyakhananga eshikhaya.”
Mana eshinyasio shioluyoka nishibabukula mumabwibwi
Mana nikhukhola hasi wabu okhuba hekulu, mana nikhubakwisilia ifula ya machina yeliloba lwomumulilo.”
Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu baretsanga amakhuwa khushichelo
Ne toto tsingongo etso tsili khutsinjila tsiburungwakhwo
Toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko khubasuubili
Netoto Abandu bomushitsimi bali ababii
Mana nikhubahelesia eshinyasio, ne ebialo bibili bino bili khunjila ili habulafu
Netoto Abandu ba Hijri bayingasia Abarumwa
Ne nikhubahelesia abimanyisio biefu nabo nibalabukulamwo oluchendo tawe
Ne bakwotanga tsingulu nibakasia tsinzu
Mana eshinyasio shioluyoka nishibabukula mumabwibwi
Mana akabakholanga nikalabakhonyakhwo shiosi shiosi tawe
Ne shikhwalonga likulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio halali khubwatoto, ne toto indukho iliula , kho leshela okhuleshela okhulayi
Toto Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi niye omuloonji ne niye Omumanyi muno
Ne khwakhwelesia tsinyaali saba tsisomungwa ebise nebise nende Ikurani yoluyali
Ne olakhosia tsimoni tsitsio khukalia akakhwahelesia emikanda chindi hakari wabu, nohomba olababelelela tawe. Ne wishilie abasuubili olubaa lulwo. (lwetsimbabaasi)
Ne boolambu:“ toto esie nesie Omwikanyilisi Omwinoosi.(owahabulafu)
Shingala khweshilia balia (eshinyasio bosi) balia abekaba emikanda (okhwikalila abusalamu)
Balia bakhola Ikurani okhuba omubunjikho kwobubeyi
Kho nditsuba khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi mbu khulibareeba bosi
Khukalia koosi akabakholanga
Kho yusia akawalomesibwa ne obe ehale nende Abatsokaasi
Toto efwe khukhuyela okhulinda nende abakhubayilanga
Balia abatsokasinjia Nyasaye nende Abanyasaye bandi balitsa okhumanya
Netoto khwamanya mbu eshilifu shishio shinyoolanga obusiro khukalia akababoolanga
Kho tswenula Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi khulwa okhumwitsoomia , ne obe halala nende bamwinamilanga nibasujuda
Ne olaame Nyasaye wuwo okhuula likhuulile eliatoto elo . (lifwa)
